name: Queen of Pain
title: Akasha
lore: The Queen of Pain delights in the suffering of others, using her agility and magic to torment foes.

shadowStrike.name: Shadow Strike
shadowStrike.description: Throws a dagger that damages and slows an enemy, dealing damage over time.

blink_qop.name: Blink
blink_qop.description: Queen of Pain teleports to a target location.

screamOfPain.name: Scream of Pain
screamOfPain.description: Releases a sonic wave that damages nearby enemies.

sonicWave.name: Sonic Wave
sonicWave.description: Creates a devastating wave of sound that damages all enemies in its path.
